Archer’s Glory.name: Archer’s Glory
Archer’s Glory.flavor: One enemy falls, and those that remain are about to learn what heroism is all about.
Archer’s Glory.trigger: One of your ranged attacks drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer
Archer’s Glory.effect: You gain an action point that you must spend before the end of your next turn.

Combined Fire.name: Combined Fire
Combined Fire.flavor: You combine fire with one of your allies to take down a troublesome foe.
Combined Fire.trigger: An ally makes a ranged attack or an area attack
Combined Fire.target: One creature attacked by your ally

Quarry’s Bane.name: Quarry’s Bane
Quarry’s Bane.flavor: You have multiple quarries in your sights, so you unleash a deadly volley of shots at each of them.
Quarry’s Bane.target: Each enemy designated as your quarry
Quarry’s Bane.onMiss: The target is knocked prone as it dodges your attack.
